element.name: AMResorts
element.amenities: Endless Privileges®, Unlimited-Luxury® & Unlimited-Fun® | Hotel Accommodations | Endless Gourmet Meals, Snacks and Top-shelf Spirits | Hotel Tax & Service Charges | Non-motorized Watersports | Daily Activities | Nightly Entertainment
element.bodycopy: Each with its own charming design, Zoëtry Wellness & Spa Resorts, Secrets, Breathless, Dreams, Now and Sunscape Resorts & Spas will surely take your breath away. Specializing in luxury accommodations, guest rooms and suites are elegantly designed. The cuisine chefs specialize in gourmet dining and the world-class spas make for a serene experience. The landscapes of these resorts make the ideal backdrop of your dream wedding or honeymoon so your time together will be in the perfect setting.

element.name: All-Inclusive Hard Rock Hotels
element.amenities: Hotel Accommodations | All Meals, Drinks and Snacks | Hotel Tax & Service Charges | Non-motorized Watersports | Daily Activities | Nightly Entertainment
element.titlecopy: Celebrate your love at a killer all-inclusive HardRock Resort
element.bodycopy: The all-inclusive Hard Rock Hotels located in Mexico and Dominican Republic offer an all day, all night, all-inclusive vacation experience. Whether you’re rocking out at one of the nightly concerts, indulging in the awesome collection of water sports or being pampered in excess, Hard Rock Hotels make your rock star fantasies a reality. And when you’re through turning your notches all the way up, turn them down at Hard Rock’s world-renowned Rock Spa® or by one of the alluring pools with a view of the tropics. Celebrate your big day and lavish in luxury.
element.teasercopy: Celebrate your love at a killer all-inclusive HardRock Resort

element.name: Palace Resorts & Le Blanc Spa Resort
element.amenities: Hotel Accommodations | All Meals, Drinks and Snacks | Hotel Tax & Service Charges | Non-motorized Watersports | Daily Activities | Nightly Entertainment
element.titlecopy: Live in awe at Palace Resorts | Pleasure in every sense at Le Blanc Spa Resort
element.bodycopy:
Palace Resorts offer signature amenities and service that will leave you in awe of the exceptional all-inclusive vacation experience provided. The oceanfront accommodations feature spacious family rooms and suites with double Whirlpool tubs, luxurious amenities including 24-hour room service, fine dining, championship golf courses and world-class spas (both available at an additional cost). The new Awe-inclusive concept enhances Palace's already superb amenities with features such as premium spirits. Whether day or night, exceptional celebrity entertainment will make for an experience to remember with artists like Ricky Martin! Whatever your needs, let Palace Resorts help you relax and rejuvenate.

The adults only Le Blanc Spa Resort is located in the heart of the Hotel Zone facing a spectacular and white sandy beach. Known for its impeccable personalized service, with a butler on every floor and with nearly one staff per guest, this resort allows each guest to feel pampered. Indulge in every way possible, whether at the spa (services available at additional charge), at one of the five delicious restaurants or poolside with a cool beverage. The signature spa provides every guest with a rejuvenating experience for the mind, body and soul. For the ideal newlywed experience, have your wedding or honeymoon at the AAA five-diamond award winning, Le Blanc Spa Resort, where the world is your own. No children. No distractions. No interruptions. All of this and more awaits you at Le Blanc Spa Resort. Pleasure in every sense.
element.teasercopy: Live in awe at Palace Resorts | Pleasure in every sense at Le Blanc Spa Resort

element.name: RIU Hotels & Resorts
element.amenities: Hotel Accommodations | All Meals, Drinks and Snacks | Hotel Tax & Service Charges | Non-motorized Watersports | Daily Activities | Nightly Entertainment
element.bodycopy: These hotels are located just footsteps from the beach and boast impeccable swimming pools, tennis courts and restaurants that make for both exciting days and nights. With all-inclusive service, entertainment, sports and dining, and complimentary Wi-Fi in the lobby area (and in the guestrooms at Palace properties), your experiences will keep you coming back to RIU Hotels & Resorts for more. Delight in the rich flavors and colors of Riu’s rich cuisine. And if you’re looking to relax, soak in the sun and cool ocean breeze while you sit under the palm trees on of Riu’s white sand beaches. Or tap into your adventurous side with activities like windsurfing and body boarding.

element.name: Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts
element.amenities: Hotel Accommodations | All Meals, Drinks and Snacks | Hotel Tax & Service Charges | Non-motorized Watersports | Daily Activities | Nightly Entertainment
element.titlecopy: Exceed your expectations at Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts
element.bodycopy:
Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts offers one of the world’s most breathtaking beachfront settings, spacious accommodations, an array of restaurants, bars, daily activities, sports entertainment, live shows...and more, all included in the 24-hour all-inclusive plan!
Take a dip and enjoy snorkeling off of the coast of one of Bahia Principe’s beautiful beaches or get in a game of beach volleyball. Once you’ve finished rediscovering your adventurous side, indulge in the colorful and mouth watering dishes, elegantly prepared by one of the talented chefs. Celebrate your wedding or honeymoon and relax and be pampered at Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts.
element.teasercopy: Exceed your expectations at Bahia Principe Hotels & Resorts

element.name: IBEROSTAR Hotels & Resorts
element.amenities: Hotel Accommodations | All Meals, Drinks and Snacks | Hotel Tax & Service Charges | Non-motorized Watersports | Daily Activities | Nightly Entertainment
element.titlecopy: Create memories that will last a lifetime at IBEROSTAR Hotels & Resorts
element.bodycopy: IBEROSTAR Hotels & Resorts are in ideal locations to set up your dream getaway. Stay at one of their beachfront resorts and let the sun be your alarm clock and let the moon tuck you in. Enjoy any of the IBEROSTAR properties to receive 5-star treatment and be pampered in luxurious all-inclusive accommodations. Food lovers, golfers, adventurous and beach lovers alike can enjoy these resorts’ entertainment options, spa facilities and pools.
element.teasercopy: Create memories that will last a lifetime at IBEROSTAR Hotels & Resorts
